title: Change in costs causes movement on demand curve

content.prompt: The graph above shows the market demand for good X. A movement from point A to point B would most likely be caused by

choices.label: an increase in the price of good Z, a substitute
a decrease in production costs for good X
a decrease in the supply of good X

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
